SLS Catering and Hygiene > Fast Food Packaging Fast Food Packaging In 1976, SLS became the first supplier of sandwich sealing and packaging systems in the whole of Cornwall. Thirty years on, we continue to provide innovative and cost effective solutions with a diverse range of packaging products.
If your business is providing food on the move, SLS have it all wrapped up. From good old-fashioned fish&chips to chic, exclusive homemade soups, we can help you to deliver the goods in style, with ranges to suit all budgets.
Select a Fast Food Packaging sub-category:
Bar Meal Baskets (2) Card Boxes (15) Caterware Platters (Re-useable Foil) (3) Chip Containers&Trays (13) Disposable Cups (35) Disposable Plates (9) Disposable Salad&Dessert Dishes (27) Disposable Sundries (2) Food Wrapping (6) Institutional Catering - Foil Containers (12) Lidded Hot Food Containers (18) Paper Bags&Carriers (44) Plastic Disposable Cutlery (17) Soup&A Sandwich (33) Soup,Chilli, Stew, Couscous, Stir Fry (7) Table Numbers (3)
